definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: A similar question remains for the inheritance of the epigenetic characteristics from parents to offspring.
sentences.chinese: 表觀遺傳特性的同樣問題存在於親代和子代之間。

sentences.english: Objectives: To investigate the relation between obstetric complications and schizophrenia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討母親孕產期併發症與子代精神分裂症的關係。

sentences.english: Maternal immunity is the immunity transferred from mother to offspring.
sentences.chinese: 母源性免疫即母體傳遞給子代的免疫力。

sentences.english: Natural selection favors those genotypes that manage to produce and rear successfully the most offspring.
sentences.chinese: 天擇藉由不同基因型而產生及培育大多數成功的子代。

sentences.english: Which suggests that some algae may be handed down directly from parent to child.
sentences.chinese: 這表明一些藻類也許直接通過親代直接傳到子代。

sentences.english: The level of genetic diversity of the progenies of reciprocal crosses with the same parents was almost identical.
sentences.chinese: 相同親本正反交子代羣體的遺傳多樣性差別不明顯。

sentences.english: The vigour of two-parent progenies was likely to be similar.
sentences.chinese: 雙親本子代的生活力多半是相似的。

sentences.english: On the other hand, pass your Kombucha babies on to your friends.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，把你的康普茶子代傳遞給你的朋友。

sentences.english: Genes are tiny pieces of matter that carry information from parents to offspring.
sentences.chinese: 基因是一種將遺傳信息從父代傳給子代的微小物質。

sentences.english: Progenies were produced by each mother tree with 19 male trees.
sentences.chinese: 平均每個採種母樹與19個父本產生子代。

sentences.english: But fathers have no contact with their daughters except through the sperm that created them.
sentences.chinese: 但是父本與子代並未聯繫，除非通過精子造成影響。

sentences.english: To explore the effects of formaldehyde on organs and blood cells in rat offspring.
sentences.chinese: 探討甲醛對大鼠子代臟器及血液細胞的影響。

sentences.english: Each mating has generated all possible types of haploid progeny.
sentences.chinese: 每種配對都產生出所有可能單倍體子代。

sentences.english: Somatic cells divide by mitosis producing daughter cells identical to the parent cell.
sentences.chinese: 體細胞通過有絲分裂增殖產生與親本相似的子代細胞。

definition: allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)
